parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the account where you want to create a new VPC connection.

parameters.name: VPCConnectionId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC connection that you're creating. This ID is a unique identifier for each Amazon Web Services Region in an Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The display name for the VPC connection.

parameters.name: SubnetIds
parameters.description: A list of subnet IDs for the VPC connection. (string) ---

parameters.name: SecurityGroupIds
parameters.description: A list of security group IDs for the VPC connection. (string) ---

parameters.name: DnsResolvers
parameters.description: A list of IP addresses of DNS resolver endpoints for the VPC connection. (string) ---

parameters.name: RoleArn
parameters.description: The IAM role to associate with the VPC connection.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A map of the key-value pairs for the resource tag or tags assigned to the VPC connection. (dict) --- The key or keys of the key-value pairs for the resource tag or tags assigned to the resource. Tag key. Tag value.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the VPC connection.

nested_items.name: VPCConnectionId
nested_items.description: The ID for the VPC connection that you're creating. This ID is unique per Amazon Web Services Region for each Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: CreationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the creation of the VPC connection.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityStatus
nested_items.description: The availability status of the VPC connection.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
